sentences.cn: “ 你是个电车工人 吗 ?

sentences.en: " The Yankees were moving on Jonesboro, to cut the railroad.
sentences.cn: " 北方佬向琼斯博罗扑过来了, 来截断铁路.

sentences.en: Born of a railroad, Atlanta grew as its railroads grew.
sentences.cn: 亚特兰大由一条铁路诞生, 也和它的铁路同时成长.

sentences.en: Bridges over railroad tracks root danger out in crossing.
sentences.cn: 铁轨上空的天桥排除了穿行中的危险.

sentences.en: He seems to have conceived an abject, unreasoned terror of the Railroad.
sentences.cn: 他好象对铁路公司抱着一种意气消沉, 不可理喻的恐惧心理.

sentences.en: His enemies tried to railroad him to prison without a fair trial.
sentences.cn: 他的敌人企图以轻率的审判使他坐牢.

sentences.en: My brother is working on the railroad.
sentences.cn: 我兄弟在铁路系统工作.

sentences.en: Railroad companies often charged unequal or unfair rates.
sentences.cn: 铁路公司定价常常不合理.

sentences.en: The excitement of railroad building also brought abuses.
sentences.cn: 修建铁路热也引起了一些弊端.

sentences.en: The gifts to him would have filled a railroad freight car.
sentences.cn: 他的生日礼物足以装满一节火车车厢.

sentences.en: The railroad connects two cities, namely, New York and Chicago.
sentences.cn: 这条铁路连接两个城市, 即纽约与芝加哥.

sentences.en: The railroad finally reached Santa Barbara in 1877.
sentences.cn: 铁路终于在1877年修到了圣巴巴拉。

sentences.en: The railroad slopes up slightly at this point.
sentences.cn: 铁路从这儿开始微微向上倾斜.

sentences.en: The supplies were sent on the railroad.
Then the railroad building era really began.
sentences.cn: 铁轨也在慢慢向北延伸.

sentences.en: Troops have seized the airport and railroad terminals.
sentences.cn: 军队已控制了机场和火车站。

words.tran_cn: 由铁路运输；乘火车旅行（railroad的ing形式）

phrases.tran_cn: 铁路穿越；铁路公路交叉道口；铁路平交道

trans.tran_cn: 铁路，铁道，铁路公司，铁路部门
迫使…仓促行事，强迫…做，轻率判处， 在铁路工作；乘火车旅行
